issues.brexitEurope: I have decided to stand because as a laborer who loves of Sovereignty and basic democracy that was once waked so highly in this country, although as much as anyone appreciate and encourage cross border dialogue and mutual co-operation, I feel that we must regain control over our own destiny rather than trying to frame our own laws without interference from Brussels and abroad.

images.caption: MIKE WIETESKA Official UKIP Candidate for Aberconwy

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet provides insights into MIKE WIETESKA's background and motivations, including his migration to Australia, return to Britain, and work internationally with different organizations.
